title: The Tragedy of the Friend Zone (w/ Rude Jude, Baron Vaughn & Open Mic Eagle)
description: Rude Jude from "The All Out Show" on Sirius XM's Shade 45 joins The Bonfire. Baron Vaughn and Open Mike Eagle come in and tell us about their new show on Comedy Central, "The New Negroes." Dan & Jay have fun with "Pimp My Ride" and discuss the tragedy of the friend zone.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
